course_title: Theoretical Perspectives in Nursing: Infants, Children, Youth and their Families

002.building: P. A. Woodward Instructional Resources Centre

description: Analysis and application of theories, concepts, evidence and competencies guiding professional nursing practice with infants, children, youth and their families in a variety of practice settings and contexts. Students who take NURS 346 cannot earn credit for NURS 334 or NURS 423. This course is eligible for Cr/F for 19W2 only.
